name: Eurocode 0: Basis of Structural Design
description: Eurocode 0 establishes the basis of structural design for buildings and civil engineering works. It provides the fundamental requirements and principles for structural safety, serviceability, and durability.

rules.name: Structural Safety - Ultimate Limit State
rules.description: Structures shall be designed to have adequate resistance against ultimate limit states

actions.message: Structural element must have adequate design resistance against ultimate limit states per EN 1990-2.1.1

rules.name: Structural Safety - Serviceability Limit State
rules.description: Structures shall be designed to have adequate resistance against serviceability limit states

actions.message: Structural element must have adequate resistance against serviceability limit states per EN 1990-2.1.2

rules.name: Reliability - Target Reliability
rules.description: Structures shall be designed to achieve target reliability levels

actions.message: Structural element must achieve target reliability index of 3.8 per EN 1990-2.2.1

rules.name: Durability - Design Working Life
rules.description: Structures shall be designed for specified design working life

actions.message: Structural element must be designed for minimum 50-year working life per EN 1990-2.3.1

rules.name: Robustness - Structural Integrity
rules.description: Structures shall be designed to have adequate robustness

actions.message: Structural element must have adequate robustness level per EN 1990-2.4.1

rules.name: Design Situations - Persistent and Transient
rules.description: Design shall consider persistent and transient design situations

actions.message: Structural element must be verified for both persistent and transient design situations per EN 1990-2.5.1

rules.name: Combination of Actions - Fundamental Combination
rules.description: Actions shall be combined according to fundamental combination rules

actions.message: Actions must be combined according to fundamental combination rules per EN 1990-2.6.1

rules.name: Partial Factors - Material Properties
rules.description: Partial factors for material properties shall be applied

actions.message: Partial factors for material properties must be applied per EN 1990-2.7.1

rules.name: Partial Factors - Actions
rules.description: Partial factors for actions shall be applied

actions.message: Partial factors for actions must be applied per EN 1990-2.8.1

rules.name: Design Values - Characteristic Values
rules.description: Design values shall be derived from characteristic values

actions.message: Design values must be derived from characteristic values per EN 1990-2.9.1

rules.name: Verification - Ultimate Limit States
rules.description: Verification of ultimate limit states shall be performed

actions.message: Verification of ultimate limit states must be completed per EN 1990-2.10.1
